title: With Few Answers On Missing Teens, Frustration Simmers In Nigeria
teaser: Activists and parents demonstrated in the Nigerian capital, hoping to force the government to do more to rescue nearly 200 abducted teen girls, who have been missing for over two weeks. There is still little reliable information about the situation.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
